reviews.review_msg: I took it online and she is the most rude instructor I have ever seen from sfu. Once I misunderstood something from assignment, she says "It was very inconvenient to mark and it was my waste of time" Is this supposed to be the right way to give a feedback to a student? She handed back the assignment few days later than the expected date. TERRIBLE!

It's a distance ed. course.  Isolde's been slow in answering questions (and worse still, her answers are not that helpful); and unreasonably slow in marking assignments.  Not to mention being 10 minutes late in the final exam (the whole class was anxiously waiting for her to arrive)!!  Needs totally independent study in the course.
